price: (57) The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.
arabic: لَخَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lakhalqu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi akbaru min khalqi al-nāsi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
